cab.content: From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,Qth December 1919.(Repeated Constantinople, Kazim, Baghdad and Teheran under Chiefs No. 78795.)(Received 8th.)16396. Malleson telegraphs 4th December : "Frontier reports that Bolshevics intend starting decisive advance on Krasno-vodsk on 3rd December." They have received very large reinforcement including aeroplanes, and areconfident of success. Bolshevics claim to be in. touch with Caspian Fleet and saythat Baku is ripe for revolution."
